entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 7:25 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:25 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:25 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
